#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Tees.

== Name ==

*[CTees Tees]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Tees (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
				Set of tees from which a golf course can be played.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...  colour = xs:string  date-from = xs:date  date-to = xs:date  gender = [SGolfingGender GolfingGender]  
            *name = xs:string*
            units = [SUnitOfLengthWithUnitsEnum UnitOfLengthWithUnitsEnum]>  ([CHoleQualification qualification], [CTee tee]{1,18}, [CVersion version]`*`  )</...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CHoleQualification golfml:HoleQualification] || [CHoleQualification qualification] ||  					Qualification of the hole for handicaping purposes.				 ||
|| [CTee golfml:Tee] || [CTee tee] ||  Description of a single hole ||
|| [CVersion golfml:Version] || [CVersion version] ||  					Records tee set modifications over time.				 ||      

=== Attributes ===

|| Name || Description || Type || Use || Default || Fixed || Form ||
        
|| colour ||   || xs:string || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||
|| date-from ||   || xs:date || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||
|| date-to ||   || xs:date || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||
|| gender ||   || [SGolfingGender golfml:GolfingGender] || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||
|| name ||   || xs:string || required ||  ||  || unqualified ||
|| units ||   || [SUnitOfLengthWithUnitsEnum golfml:UnitOfLengthWithUnitsEnum] || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CGolfCourse GolfCourse]
----
    <xs:complexType name="Tees">  <xs:sequence>    <xs:element name="qualification" type="golfml:HoleQualification">    </xs:element>    <xs:element maxOccurs="18" name="tee" type="golfml:Tee">    </xs:element>    <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="version" type="golfml:Version">    </xs:element>  </xs:sequence>  <xs:attribute name="date-from" type="xs:date"/>  <xs:attribute name="date-to" type="xs:date"/>  <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string" use="required"/>  <xs:attribute name="colour" type="xs:string"/>  <xs:attribute name="gender" type="golfml:GolfingGender"/>  <xs:attribute name="units" type="golfml:UnitOfLengthWithUnitsEnum"/></xs:complexType>
----
